about_the_game:
In Spy Fever each player has 8 agents: 4 saboteurs and 4 infiltrators.
Which of your agents they are is however unknown to your opponent, as theirs are to you.
The objectives of the game are simple, the path to winning is filled with misdirection and incomplete information.

Three ways to win
- Infiltration: Plant an infiltrator behind the enemy lines.
- Sabotage: Plant your 4 saboteurs by getting them captured.
- Counter Intelligence: Capture all 4 enemy infiltrators.

Online
Start a game with your opponent by using a shared secret, regardless if they are on their computer, phone, or tablet.

Hot seat
Play eachother on the same computer by taking turns, no peaking!

Spectate
Players not taking part can watch as the game unfolds from the sideline, perfect for tournaments and friendly matches.

Spy craft
Gain information, create misdirection and change the conditions of the playing field using the Spy Craft cards.

short_description: Challenge a friend (or enemy!) to a devious 2 player battle of wits and incomplete information. Use spy craft cards to confuse, gain information and turn the tide in your favour. In the shadows of deception, only the clever survive.
